item.title: Humana provides a peak into its Medicare Advantage plan ratings, and the stock jumps
item.description: Humana’s stock spiked after the health insurer disclosed some findings from the government’s Star Ratings for its 2026 Medicare Advantage plans.

item.title: Don’t ignore this upcoming Medicare update — it could be the most important message of the year
item.description: The ANOC has crucial information you need to see before Medicare’s open enrollment begins on Oct. 15.

item.title: This S&P 500 sector gauge points to ‘excessive’ confidence and imminent pullback

item.title: As Warren Buffett nears retirement, he’s making his biggest purchase in years
item.description: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway says it is acquiring a “robust portfolio of operating assets” in Occidental’s OxyChem.

item.title: No jobs report on Friday. But that may not be the worst data delay due to the federal shutdown.
